entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , 100 Mile House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clinton 10:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming southeast 20 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
